resources.string: Would you like to cancel the current VPN Connection?
Please write down your comments below this line.

In most Android devices, open Android's Settingâ€”>Battery-->Battery optimization, select All apps in the dropdown menu, find SuperVPN and set it to Don't optimize. In HuaWei devices, open Android's Setting-->Battery-->Launch, find SuperVPN in the app list, switch off to Manage manually, enable Auto-launch and Run in background.
 Or you can find battery setting in Protected Apps.
 In Samsung devices, open Android's Setting-->Battery-->App Power Saving-->Details, find SuperVPN in the app list and disabled it.
 In other devices, you may find it in Setting-->Battery as Background activity or Protected apps.
2. How long can I use VPN Master for each connection?
3. Why "can't" I use internet after connection established?
4. How to disable battery optimization for VPN Master?
6. When I try to connect, Android system request a permission, but I can not accept it, why?
Click connect button in the main screen to use VPN Master. If Android system show a dialog to request a connection permission, click OK or Accept to continue.
As long as you can. We don/t set time or traffic limition on each connection

Fist of all, check your network connection. Then make sure "you've" disabled battery optimization for MaxCloud in "Android's" battery setting (which means enable background activity for MaxCloud). If you enable Smart Proxy, you also need to make sure all the apps you need to proxy is checked in Smart Proxy setting.

On Android 5.0 or above, you can only enable some of the apps to use VPN Master to proxy traffic, and all the other apps use local network. For example, if Facebook and Skype are blocked in your country, make them checked in Smart Proxy. After the VPN connection is established, only Facebook and "Skype's" traffic go through VPN, and all your other apps will perform as good as usual.

You may be running some app which changes the screen color or opens a floating window. "Android's" security system prevent VPN to be running under these cases. You need close this kind of app temporarily to continue.
